name: 100 Christmas Cats
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2687190/100_Christmas_Cats/?utm_source=WidgetTop

⛄🌟 WELCOME TO 100 CHRISTMAS CATS – THE BEST HIDDEN OBJECTS GAME! 🎄🎨

🎄 Dive into the most festive adventure in the heart of holiday cheer! 🌟 Discover the enchanting hand-drawn scenes of a holiday cityscape as you set out on a quest to uncover 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. 🎅🎨
😸 Test your attention and focus in this cozy and delightful hidden object game 😊
Each cat is more charming than the last, and every discovery brings a smile to your face.

🐈🕵️‍♂️ Can you find them all? 🕵️‍♂️🐈

⚙️ Key Features ⚙️

  • 🎮 1 Level
  • 🎮 1 Extra Level
  • 🐈 100 Hidden Cats
  • 🐈 100 More Extra Cats
  • 🎵 2 Awesome Soundtrack
  • 🎨 High Quality Resolution Artworks
  • 🥇 Achievements
  • 🏆 Many Leaderboards
  • ⌛️ SpeedRun Mode (Timer)
  • 🌗 Brightness Settings
  • 💾 Progress Saves
  • 🔍 Zoom
  • 😺 Real Meow Sounds!
  • 💥 Combo Counter!
  • 👫 Community
  • 🌐 No Text

🏆 START YOUR AMAZING JOURNEY IN THE WORLD OF CATS RIGHT NOW 🏆

Don't miss out on the cutest and exciting puzzle game ever! Come to 100 Christmas Cats and start your amazing adventure today!
